room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Tower Adventure" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had an amazing time. We did 2 rooms back to back. Very fun, lots of puzzles, locks, and sn interactive game master. So much fun we can't wait to go back.

room_title: Escape room "The Witch's Tower Adventure" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our group did 2 rooms and both were top notch. We cant wait to complete Pirates and are looking for to coming soon rooms. All aspects of this escape room facility was outstanding. I highly recommend a visit.
